revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 58:;(Pharmouthi) 23:;Tapetesouchos, daughter of Korakion through the agency of Melanous alias Tasoucharion; daughter of Petesouchos (wife of Priskos, the physician);;(in left margin: drachmas 116 obols 24) orchard taxes for the 12th year in Karanis, Psenarpsenesis, apomoira drachmas20 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 3 obol 1 chalki 2, naubion drachmas 2 obol 0.5;;surcharges drachmas 5 obol 1 chalki 2, eparourion drachmas 17 obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3, kollybos obols 5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 51 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 51 obols 3, surcharges drachmas 3 obol 1.5, in total drachmas 54 obols 4.5;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year drachmas 2 obols 5.5, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 2;;other land taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 5;;geometria for the 12th year drchmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 4 obol 2.5 chalki 2;;Apollonios, son of Horos (Kiabsios);;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 13 obols 3, surcharges obols 5 chalki 2;;Horos the younger, son of Hatres, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus, obols 28;;Segathis, daughter of Onnophris through the agency of Tapeis, daughter of Horion (Nanis);naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year obols 3, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 3.5 chalki 2;;Mysthes, son of Phaesis, grandson of Mysthes, mother Aunchis, drachmas 8;;Thaesis, daughter of Onnophris (Sabinos, son of Salis);;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 27) orchard taxes for the 12th yearapomoira drachmas 2 obols 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 4.5;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obols 2.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obol 0.5, surcharges obols 2.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 7 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year obols 2.5, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 3;;in total for the day drachmas 160 obols 19;;Pharmouthi 24 likewise:;Horion, son of Heraklas, mother Demarous, drachmas 20;;Heras alias Aphrodisios, son of Heras, grandson of Petheus, mother Apollonarion, drachmas 8;;Nemesas, slave of Apollonous, drachmas 8;;Harpagathes, son of Satabous, grandson of Anchophis, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Phaesis (Phaesis, son of Heuremon);;(in left margin: drachmas 44 obols 9) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5 obols 3.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 5, naubion obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 4.5, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 12 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 14 obol 0.5, surcharges obols 5.5, in total drachmas 15.;and Gaius Longinus Macrinus;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4.5;;eparourion drachmas 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obols 4.5 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 7 obols 3, surcharges obols 3, in total drachmas 8;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year obols 4.5, surcharges obol 0.5 , kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 5 chalki 2;;Horos, son of Anchorymphis, grandson of Horos, mother Achillis, drachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
